title: Rep. Don Beyer, 2020 Polling, DC Police Reform
itunes:title: Rep. Don Beyer, 2020 Polling, DC Police Reform
description:
Guests: Julie Zauzmer, D.C. government reporter for the Washington Post, Virginia Congressman Don Beyer, Mick Mulvaney, Special Envoy to Northern Ireland and Former Acting White House Chief of Staff and Former Director of the Office of Management and Budget, Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President, and Wendy Benjamin, Bloomberg Politics Editor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
